Uses of Class
com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.Application

Packages that use Application
com.sun.tools.visualvm.application Support for applications in VisualVM. 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.jvm This package uses Jvmstat, JMX, SA and Attach API to present unifiled view for JVM. 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.type Package with basic ApplicationType(s). 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.views Support for views (subtabs) for applications and application snapshots. 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.heapdump Support for heap dumps in VisualVM. 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.jmx JMX connections support in VisualVM. 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.threaddump Support for thread dumps in VisualVM. 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.tools.attach Attach API support in VisualVM. 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.tools.jmx JMX support in VisualVM. 
com.sun.tools.visualvm.tools.jvmstat Jvmstat support in VisualVM.

Methods in com.sun.tools.visualvm.application with parameters of type Application
protected static java.lang.String ApplicationDescriptor.resolveApplicationName(Application application, ApplicationType type)
          Returns Application name if available in Snapshot Storage as PROPERTY_NAME or user-provided display name defined by JVM argument -Dvisualvm.display.name (since VisualVM 1.3.4) or generates new name using the provided ApplicationType.
